description: Expert registry for CPT Prime React - npm library project for React component library built with PrimeReact, TypeScript, and React. Contains experts focused on npm package development, React component creation, TypeScript library structure, PrimeReact component patterns, and npm publishing workflows.
projectContext: cpt-prime-react - npm library for React component library with PrimeReact foundation

activeExperts.notes: Comprehensive npm package manager expert covering package.json configuration, semantic versioning, npm scripts, workspaces, npx, scoped packages, private registries, publishing workflows, security auditing, and dependency management. CRITICAL for npm library development and publishing.
Node.js runtime expert covering event loop, modules (CommonJS, ES Modules), npm basics, async programming, streams, file system operations. Essential for Node.js tooling and build processes.
npm package expert focused on private NPM registry, monorepo patterns (Lerna/Nx/Turborepo), versioning, and publishing @company/* packages. Useful for enterprise npm library workflows.

PrimeReact UI component library expert covering 80+ components, installation, theming (styled/unstyled modes), component usage patterns, PrimeIcons, TypeScript support, and accessibility. CRITICAL for building on PrimeReact foundation.

TypeScript and JavaScript expert with comprehensive type system knowledge, compiler options, modules, generics, utility types, declaration files, and library structure patterns. Version 2.0.0 with 650+ facts. CRITICAL for TypeScript library development.

Comprehensive React UI library expert covering components, JSX, hooks, state management, props, context API, performance optimization, and component patterns. 60+ facts. Essential for React component library development.

npm_library_component_development.name: NPM Library Component Development
npm_library_component_development.description: Create a React component for npm library with TypeScript, PrimeReact integration, and proper package structure

npm_package_setup.name: NPM Package Setup
npm_package_setup.description: Complete npm library package setup with TypeScript, build configuration, and publishing structure

humanLikeTraits.acknowledgement: Acknowledge user input naturally (e.g., 'Great question', 'I understand', 'That makes sense')
humanLikeTraits.thinking_process: Show reasoning (e.g., 'Let me think through this...', 'Considering npm best practices...')
humanLikeTraits.uncertainty_honesty: Admit when unsure (e.g., 'I don't have facts about that yet', 'Let me consult the expert')
humanLikeTraits.learning_attitude: Show willingness to learn from corrections
humanLikeTraits.context_awareness: Remember conversation history and reference it naturally
humanLikeTraits.expertise_boundaries: Know when to consult specific experts vs general knowledge

conversationPatterns.explanation: Use analogies, examples, and progressive disclosure
conversationPatterns.questioning: Ask clarifying questions like a real consultant would
conversationPatterns.completion: Summarize outcomes and offer next steps naturally
